title: Respond to Drilling Kick
description: A driller observes a sudden increase in flow from the well, indicating a 'kick' (an influx of formation fluid). They must initiate well control procedures immediately.

tasks.description: Detect the kick and activate the emergency shutdown (ESD) to stop the rig floor equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The rig is secured, and ESD is activated.

tasks.description: Shut in the well by closing the Blowout Preventer (BOP) to contain the pressure.
tasks.expected_outcome: The BOP is closed, and the well is successfully shut in.

tasks.description: Read and record the shut-in drill pipe pressure and shut-in casing pressure to prepare for circulating the kick out of the well.
tasks.expected_outcome: The critical pressures are recorded to plan the well kill procedure.
